name: A Quick Bunny Affair
description:
A QUICK BUNNY AFFAIR A rabbit, its garden... and a lot of carrots!

Grow carrots to feed your family 🥕

To grow a carrot:

[3 steps]

✔️ plant a seed;

✔️ water it;

✔️ and pick the carrot when it's ready!

Each step last one season.

[10'/season]

Bring the carrots back to the box if you don't want your children to starve...

[Controls]

Pad : Stick to move, A to Jump, X to Interact

Keyboard : Arrow to move, Space to Jump,  E/LeftCTRL to Interact
